sense.def:
To commission a piece of work
pomeni uradno priskrbeti plačilo za nekoga, da nekaj naredi namesto nas.

seg.quote: The Times commissioned a Public Opinion Poll.
I was immediately commissioned to write another book.
Red House was Webb's first commission as an architect.

sense.def:
Commission
je znesek, ki ga plačamo človeku, ki prodaja neko blago, za vsako opravljeno prodajo.

seg.quote: They get commission on top of their basic salary.

sense.def:
A commission
je tudi skupina ljudi, pristojnih, da o nečem nekaj izvedo ali nekaj nadzorujejo.

seg.quote: A commission was appointed to investigate the assassination of the President.
